name: Night Screen 2.2.0
body:
- Update French/Turkish/Polish translation & Improve English translation
- Update UI
- Add more options
- Add open source licenses
- Fix foreground service permission in Android 9

name: Night Screen 2.1.1
body:
- Update Japanese translation (Thanks @udnp )
- Fix back key

name: Night Screen 2.1.0 Beta
body:
**There are a lot of updates in 2.0.0 Beta.** Learn More: [https://github.com/fython/Blackbulb/releases/tag/2.0.0-beta](https://github.com/fython/Blackbulb/releases/tag/2.0.0-beta)

What's new:
- Show tips about how to turn on Night Screen
- Control brightness by volume buttons in panel
- Fix broken quick settings tile in Android 8.0+

name: Night Screen 2.0.0 Beta
body:
Night Screen 2.0.0 is released~
- Support Android 8.0!
- New UI, more lightweight
- Now you can adjust eyes care

name: Night Screen 1.3.0.1
body:
- Remove the limitation of time picker

中文说明：
- 移除了时间选择的限制

name: Night Screen 1.3.0 (Beta 2)
body:
- Fix SchedulerDialog layout
- Add tips for Doze mode
- Change scheduler icon by status

中文说明：
- 修复定时开关对话框布局
- 新增 Doze 模式的提醒
- 根据状态改变按钮样式

name: Night Screen 1.3.0 (Beta 1)
body:
- Automatically turn on/off night screen
- Russian translation
- Upgrade libraries

中文说明：
- 自动开关夜间屏幕功能
- 新增俄语翻译
- 升级依赖库

name: Night Screen 1.2.0
body:
- 4 Modes: No Permission Mode, Normal Mode (1.0's Overlay Mode), Overlay System Mode (May cause flash problem, but it can dim navigation bar), Eyes Care Mode (NEW:Blue filter)
- Less memory usage and standalone process for service
- Smaller APK size
- Fix auto close problem while switching app theme

中文说明：
- 4 种可选模式：零权限模式、正常模式、全覆盖模式（可能会导致闪屏但可以覆盖导航栏）、护眼模式（新：过滤蓝光）
- 后台服务占用更少的内存且使用独立进程
- 更小的安装包体积
- 修复了切换应用主题时自动关闭的问题

name: Night Screen 1.1.1
body:
- Overlay navigation bar
- You can click "Install" button in package installer when night screen is on

name: Night Screen 1.1.0
body:
- Support Android 7.0 Quick Settings Tile & Android 7.1 Shortcuts
- Add pause/resume action in notification
- Add translations: Swedish, Turkish.
- Improve English translation
- Fix displaying warning dialog twice in the first time

中文更新说明：
- 支持 Android 7.0 快速设置瓷砖和 Android 7.1 快捷方式
- 在通知中增加 暂停/恢复 操作
- 新增翻译：瑞典语、土耳其语
- 改善英文翻译
- 修复第一次启动重复显示警告对话框

name: Night Screen 1.0.2.2
body:
- Hide Night Screen from recent apps
- Add French and Spanish language translation

name: Night Screen 1.0.2.1
body:
· Support CM Quick Settings Tile
· Make service keeping alive after activity killed
· Manually get permission on Android 6.0
· Try to fix rotate problem

name: Night Screen 1.0.1
body:
· The minimum required system version is up to Android 5.0
· Reduce the size of application
· Supported landscape mode
· Show a notification while working
